mapper.update:
update thigh_track_info
thigh_track_info.curve_radius = #{CurveRadius},
thigh_track_info.direction = #{Direction},
thigh_track_info.grade_section_length = #{GradeSectionLength},
thigh_track_info.is_delete = #{IsDelete},

thigh_track_info.tie_category = #{TieCategory},
thigh_track_info.workarea_id = #{WorkareaId}

mapper.select:
select thigh_track_info.create_time, thigh_track_info.curve_radius, thigh_track_info.direction, thigh_track_info.grade_section_length, thigh_track_info.id, thigh_track_info.is_delete, thigh_track_info.line_id, thigh_track_info.max_gradient, thigh_track_info.operator, thigh_track_info.sort_num, thigh_track_info.station_id, thigh_track_info.status, thigh_track_info.thigh_track_length, thigh_track_info.thigh_track_no, thigh_track_info.thigh_track_type, thigh_track_info.tie_category, thigh_track_info.update_time, thigh_track_info.workarea_id form thigh_track_info
